control.description-key: A Multiselect Entity Attributes Metadata Option Set

property.name: Attribute
property.description-key: Field to populate multioptionset value of master table

property.name: EntityName
property.description-key: The plural logical name of the Master Entity

property.name: EntitySingularName
property.description-key: The singular logical name of the Master Entity

property.name: AttributeName
property.description-key: The logical name of the Attribute of Master Entity which is to be deplayed as multioptionset value

property.name: TargetEntityName
property.description-key: The plural logical name of the Target Entity

property.name: IntEntityPluralName
property.description-key: The plural logical name of the Intermedidate Entity

property.name: IntEntitySingularName
property.description-key: The singular logical name of the Intermedidate Entity

property.name: LookupColNameOfTargetEntityOnIntEntity
property.display-name-key: Lookup Attribute Name Of Target Entity On Intermediate Entity
property.description-key: The lookup attribute logical name of the target entity on Intermedidate Entity

property.name: LookupColNameOfMasterEntityOnIntEntity
property.display-name-key: Lookup Attribute Name Of Master Entity On Intermediate Entity
property.description-key: The lookup attribute logical name of the master entity on Intermedidate Entity

property.name: pcfValues
property.display-name-key: Lookup Attribute Name Of Master Entity On Intermediate Entity
property.description-key: The lookup attribute logical name of the master entity on Intermedidate Entity
